```
if ! getent passwd david; then
  useradd -u 123 david
elif ! $(uid david) == 123; then
  usermod -u 123 david
fi
```

```
user { 'exampleapp':
  uid => '1234'.
  gid => '123'
}
group { 'exampleapp':
  Gid => '123'
}
file { '/opt/exampleapp/':
  owner => 'exampleapp',
  group => 'exampleapp',
  mode  => 755
}
file { '/etc/exampleapp/':
  owner => 'exampleapp',
  group => 'exampleapp',
  mode  => 750
}
```
